Have a dream career in mind , than Eduvanz is want you need to get connected with. Complete your profile to increase eligibility for getting instant loans Congratulations ! \nYou are eligible for an instant loan. Apply right now and change your career. DashboardActivity
To collect and monitor information about bank transactions, names of transacting parties, description of the transactions and amount for faster loan processing. Contacts - To automatically identify potential references for your loan application. \nCall History - To gain information from your call logs that may be useful in the processing of your loan application. To collect and monitor specific information about your device including IMEI number , call logs and phone number , in order to uniquely identify the device and ensure unauthorized devices are not able to act on your behalf, thereby help us prevent fraudulent activity. Camera - To allow to take pictures required for loan application.\nStorage - To allow to upload documents and pictures for your loan application. Location -To collect and monitor information about location of your device.\nApp Usage - To gain information about your interest and likings to generate your credit score that may be useful in the processing of your loan application. Paytm Payment- with options like Paytm Wallet, Debit Card, BHIM UPI, Net banking.
